summary: Huabing Zhao is an ICT veteran with a passion for open source. He has a solid experience in the telecommunication and information technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country OSS/BSS platforms/systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions. He loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including Istio(Service

content: Istio是来自Google，IBM和Lyft的一个Service Mesh（服务网格）开源项目，是Google继Kubernetes之后的又一大作,本文将演示如何从裸机开始从零搭建Istio及Bookinfo示例程序。
